From secret tasting rooms to premium chef’s tables, award- winning Broadway theater, and world-renowned spas, your next visit is set to be a one-of-a-kind adventure that only Vegas can deliver.By Vegas Uncork'dFebruary 21, 2018FacebookTwitterEmailFacebookTwitterEmailAn Avant-Garde Tasting at The Cosmopolitan of Las VegasÉ BY JOSÉ ANDRÉSNotable Spanish Chef José Andrés has a bustling bar and paella grill, Jaleo, inside The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas, but tucked behind is a small private tasting room with seating for nine.Indulge Body, Mind & Soul at The VenetianCANYON RANCH SPACLUB®At Canyon Ranch SpaClub, a luxurious spa that spans The Venetian and The Palazzo Las Vegas resorts, visitors can soothe the soul with restorative treatments, challenge their fitness with indoor rock climbing, or linger in signature Aquavana thermal cabins, whirlpools, and experiential rains.Broadway in VegasTHE SMITH CENTER FOR THE PERFORMING ARTSThe ever-changing lineup at The Smith Center offers theatre buffs a variety of hit stage shows and Tony Award-Winning classic musicals and a chance to score usually sold-out seats to shows like Hamilton, The Color Purple, and The Bodyguard.Immersive Fine Dining at MGM GrandL'ATELIER DE JOËL ROBUCHONChef Joël Robuchon allows diners to take a seat at the service counter for a one-of-a-kind view while their award-winning dishes are prepared before their eyes.Haute Cuisine & Prestige Bubbles at Caesars PalaceRESTAURANT GUY SAVOYThe ultimate fine dining experience is available for a select few at French Chef Guy Savoy’s only namesake restaurant in the U.S., at Caesars Palace.Visit VegasUncorked.com for more information.Recipes you want to make.
